friends.shortShareMessage: Potvrdite aplikaciju farmerJoe za svoj pametni telefon. Preuzmite ga danas od {{url}}.
friends.emailMessage:
Hey,

I just downloaded farmerJoe for my {{phone}}.

farmerJoe is a documentation app for farmers that is easy to use. With the app you can see your fields and crops on a map, you can add notes with a picture. You can set wait times and record fertilisers.

farmerJoe is available for iPhone and Android.

Install it from {{url}}.

password.wrong: The password is not correct. If you don't know it use the Forgotten Password link.
password.min6char: The password must be at least 6 characters long.

forgotten_password_mail_sent_to: We have sent an email to {0} with a link to reset your password. Please follow the instructions in the email to reset your password.

languages.really_change: Are you sure you want to change the language to {{language}}?

cover.showCollegesWhatIsImportantToYou: Show your colleagues what is important to you

name: Ime
email_already_in_use: Adresom e-pošte već se koristi drugi račun.

profile.reallyLogout: Jeste li sigurni da se želite odjaviti?

maps.pressToSetPin: Press on the map to set the location pin.

contact.dontDeleteData: Please don't delete the following data. We need it to properly identify you in the system. So then we can offer you better Support.

slide1.title: Thank you for choosing farmerJoe
slide1.description: Now you can easily and efficiently optimize your production.

slide2.title: Manage several Farms
slide2.description: Keep up with what's going on in your Farms with ease.

slide3.title: Easy documentation
slide3.description: Write down the stuff that's important to you. Make photos that you want to keep.

slide4.title: Find your fields with ease
slide4.description: Immediately have the overview on all fields. Use the crop age and wait time count down for your decisions.

slide5.title: Order analyses
slide5.description: Order Analyses with your smartphone. The results of them are directly fed back to your field documentation.

slide6.title: Dodaj svoje zaposlenike
slide6.description: Iskoristite svoj tim da biste bolje radili.

needLocation.title: farmerJoe treba vašu lokaciju
needLocation.description: Aplikaciji farmerJoe trenutačno nije dozvoljen pristup vašoj lokaciji.

needAlwaysLocation.title: Dozvola za lokaciju nije odobrena
needAlwaysLocation.description: Za dijeljenje vaše lokacije uživo farmerJoe treba uvijek pristup vašoj lokaciji. Ako aplikaciji ne dodijelite dozvolu, ne možete upotrebljavati ovu značajku.

cantDetermineLocation.title: farmerJoe ne može odrediti vašu lokaciju.

needPhotoLibrary.title: Nije moguć pristup slici
needPhotoLibrary.description: Molimo omogućite pristup ako želite biti u mogućnosti odabirati slike.

needCameraAccess.title: Nije moguć pristup kameri
needCameraAccess.description: Molimo omogućite pristup vašoj kameri ako želite fotografirati.

needContactsAccess.title: farmerJoe treba pristup vašim kontaktima
needContactsAccess.description: Ako želite pozvati nekoga iz adresara, molimo dodijelite aplikaciji FarmerJoe pristup kontaktima.

sketchNeedsStorage.title: farmerJoe treba pristup pohrani
sketchNeedsStorage.description: Kako biste mogli manipulirati slikama, trebamo pristup vašoj pohrani. Bez te dozvole nećete biti u mogućnosti poslati sliku.

fieldAdminAlert.message: The user is Administrator and has access on all fields in the company. If you want to forbid his access to this field & other fields you would have to make him a normal user.

comments.standardUserRights: Korisnik može stvoriti i uređivati vlastite komentare.

fertilizing.description: Odaberite ispod što korisnik može činiti s gnojenjem.

waittime.description: Odaberite ispod što korisnik može činiti s vremenom čekanja.

near.cantSortNoLocation: Ne možemo sortirati po najbližim poljima, jer nam niste omogućili pristup svojoj lokaciji.

registerScreen.helpEasySteps: Pomoći ćemo vam da stvorite račun u nekoliko jednostavnih koraka.
registerScreen.useRealName: Ako se koristite svojim stvarnim imenom, to će pomoći vašim kolegama da vas prepoznaju u vašim farmama.
registerScreen.weUsePhone: The number will be shown to colleagues in your Farms and they'll be able to easily call you.
registerScreen.weUseEmail: You'll use this email address when you log in and if you ever need to reset your password. Other farmerJoe users will be able to invite you in their Farms with this email.
registerScreen.passwordHelp: Enter a combination of at least six numbers, letters and punctuation marks (like ! and &)
registerScreen.confrim_agb_data_security: By tapping "Create Account", you agree to our {0}. Learn how we collect and use your data in our {1}, and how we use cookies and similar technology in our {2}.
registerScreen.errorEmailExist: Another account already users this email address.

location.farmCanSeeYourLocation: Everyone in the farm can see your location
location.sharedWithFarm: Position is being shared with this farm.
location.letColleaguesSeeYourLocationLabel: Let colleagues know where you are
location.letColleaguesSeeYourLocationDesc: Share your real-time location with colleagues in this Farm.

errorMessage: Ups, ovo se nije trebalo dogoditi. Razvojni tim je obaviješten.
screenTooSmall: Zaslon je premalen. Umjesto toga upotrijebite našu aplikaciju za iOS i Android.
resetPasswordLinkExpired: Vaš zahtjev za vraćanje izvorne lozinke je istekao ili je poveznica već upotrijebljena
verifyEmailLinkExpired: Vaš zahtjev za provjeru e-pošte je istekao ili je poveznica već upotrijebljena
emailChangeReverted: Vaša adresa e-pošte za prijavu vraćena je na {{email}}.
browserNotSupported: farmerJoe ne podržava Internet Explorer. Upotrijebite moderne i podržane preglednike kao što su Firefox, Chrome, Edge, Opera ili Safari.

apiKeys.ipFilterHelp: Zarezom odijeljeni popis IP adresa i raspona IP adresa. Na primjer: 127.0.0.1, 10.0.0.0/24, 2001:db8::/48
